name: Don't Stop!
description:
An arcade game about controlling your movement and completing the levels as fast as possible!

Inspired by Geometry Dash, VVVVVV and qop, Don't Stop! is a game about controlling a little square through 5 stages, dodging all the obstacles and finishing before the timer ends! 

But there's a catch: your movement gains acceleration by each second and your speed increases. While this helps you finishing the levels faster, it becomes harder and harder to move around. You can reset your speed by touching an wall, but be careful to reach the end in time. Don't get out of control and move through the levels correctly!

***

This game is my entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2020: Out of Control and was made in 48h. All programming and art was made by me. Audio assets from freesound.org and credited in game. While short and having some parts with rough coding, pretty satisfied with the result for my first game jam ever.

*** Known bugs (so far):
  • If you align the player's square sprite with specific pixels through the levels, the tilemap grid may bug and expose white outlines.
  • Your speed will not reset  if you move from an wall to another while touching it.
  • You can stop the player's movement if you move towards an wall you're already touching it while in movement.
